channel.title: ~help me with my server please!~
channel.description:
I'm am currently in construction of Drigerscape, based off pimpscape. I'm new and this is my first server so i know pretty much nothing about editing it.. I want to know how to add new npc's, and how do i make them say diffrent things? Also.. what file would all of this fall under? please help me!
*ps* YOU CAN BENIFIT FROM HELPING ME! (Free mod spot on my server, just for helping me, if, thats if, you can explain it good enough for me to do it. I'm a newbie, so go kind step by step! :P
~Thanks- Driger
